club_id.comment: The club ID if this forum belongs to a club, or NULL
club_id.name: club_id

popular_time.comment: Timestamp of when this topic will stop being popular.
popular_time.name: popular_time

question_rating.comment: If this topic is a question, it's current rating

inserts.post:
Welcome to your new Invision Community!

Take some time to read through the Getting Started Guide and Administrator Documentation.

The Getting Started Guide will walk you through some of the necessary steps to setting up your community.

The Administrator Documentation takes you through the details of the capabilities of our platform.

Go to the Documentation


Nulled by IPBMafia.ru

date.comment: Unix timestamp of when the rating was given
